'''Sleep Now, Rest Your Weary Head''' is an indoor gift set favored by the companions: [[Kachina]], [[Citlali]], [[Varesa]].

The blueprint is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=240}}.
